content:
/>
III.ii.2.E.4.b
.
LOD Determinations
Use the table below to determine the location of records associated with line-of-duty (LOD) determinations.
Date of Determination
Location of Associated Record
On or before
December 31, 1995
Office of the Judge Advocate General
Code 15 – Claims and Tort Litigation
Attn: Investigative Branch
9620 Maryland Avenue
Suite 100
Norfolk, VA 23511-2989
On or after
January 1, 1996
Staff Judge Advocate (SJA) office of the installation where the incident occurred
Note
:
SJAs retain records associated with LODs for a period of two years only. Since these records may contain medical information, they are often combined with the service member’s service treatment records (STRs).  If not, they are destroyed at the end of the two-year period.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E - Service Record Address Codes and Addresses for Military Records Centers and Other Agencies
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section E
